import React,{useState, useEffect} from 'react'; import './App.css'; import axios from 'axios'; function App() { const [data,setData] = useState({}) const [lat, setLat] = useState('') const [long, setLong] = useState('') const url = `https://api.weatherbit.io/v2.0/current/airquality?lat=${lat}&lon=${long}&key=b7c5d1e0507348789b52b6e2be32f5ec` const searchLocation = (event)=>{ if (event.key === 'Enter') { axios.get(url).then((response)=>{ setData(response.data) console.log(response.data) }) } } return (
